metacheck: Crossref Metadata Compliance

Source: R/metacheck.R
metacheck-package.Rd

Automatically check metadata compliance for hybrid open access (OA). Includes a webapp to send compliance reports by email.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://subugoe.github.io/metacheck

  • https://github.com/subugoe/metacheck

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/subugoe/metacheck/issues
